name: memorialist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who writes a memoir (= a book about a famous person's life and experiences) or a historical record of people, places, or events : He became an author, a journalist, and a memorialist of his political times. She is the ideal memorialist, because her love of the artist is balanced by her sympathy for the man.
More examplesFewer examplesHis memorialist described him as a man without much ambition who rose swiftly to high office.Though cameras have become our memorialists, they lack the emotional qualifications for the job.Memorialists often record two occupations on these later forms, and one is clearly the occupation before emigration.
